name: @steelskysoftware/facade-client
author: steelskysoftware
description: Facade router, components, rendering engine, middlewares, models, services

scripts.dist: facade build -e ./src/index.js -n facade -o dist -m -b -d -f esm -l error
scripts.build-dev: facade build -e ./src/index.js -n facade -o dist -w -p -b -f esm -l info
